SEARCH
Package edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.service

Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
edu.hogwarts.studentadmin.service.CourseService
@Service public class CourseService extends Object
This class provides service methods to manage courses in the school.

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseService

      public CourseService(CourseRepository courseRepository, TeacherService teacherService, StudentService studentService)
      Constructor for CourseService. Uses dependency injection to get the CourseRepository, TeacherService, and StudentService.
      Parameters:
      courseRepository - The repository for courses
      teacherService - The service for teachers
      studentService - The service for students

  • Method Details

    • convertToDTO

      public CourseDTO convertToDTO(Course course)
      Converts a course entity to a course DTO. If the teacher or students are not null, they are fetched from the database to ensure they exist.
      Parameters:
      course - The course entity to convert.
      Returns:
      The course DTO.

    • convertToEntity

      public Course convertToEntity(CourseDTO courseDTO)
      Converts a course DTO to a course entity. If the teacher or students are not null, they are fetched from the database to ensure they exist.
      Parameters:
      courseDTO - The course DTO to convert.
      Returns:
      The course entity.

    • getAll

      public List<CourseDTO> getAll()
      Gets list of all courses from the database
      Returns:
      List of all courses

    • get

      public CourseDTO get(Long id)
      Gets a specific course by its id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course
      Returns:
      The course with the given id, or null if it doesn't exist

    • create

      public CourseDTO create(CourseDTO courseDTO)
      Creates a new course.
      Parameters:
      courseDTO - The course to create
      Returns:
      The created course

    • update

      public CourseDTO update(Long id, CourseDTO courseDTO)
      Updates a course overwriting all its fields with the new course data.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      courseDTO - The new course data
      Returns:
      The updated course, or null if the course doesn't exist

    • patch

      public CourseDTO patch(Long id, CourseDTO courseDTO)
      Updates a course overwriting only the fields that are not null in the new course data. If the teacher or students are not null, they are fetched from the database to ensure they exist.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      courseDTO - The new course data
      Returns:
      The updated course, or null if the course doesn't exist

    • updateTeacher

      public CourseDTO updateTeacher(Long id, TeacherDTO teacherDTO)
      Updates the teacher of a course. If the teacher is not null, it is fetched from the database to ensure it exists.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      teacherDTO - The new teacher
      Returns:
      The updated course, or null if the course doesn't exist or the teacher doesn't exist

    • addStudentsByName

      public CourseDTO addStudentsByName(Long id, List<StudentDTO> studentDTOS)
      Adds students to a course, finding them by their names. If the students are not null, they are fetched from the database to ensure they exist.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      studentDTOS - The new students as a list of Student objects with at least their names set
      Returns:
      The updated course, or null if the course doesn't exist

    • addStudentsById

      public CourseDTO addStudentsById(Long id, List<StudentDTO> studentDTOS)
      Adds students to a course, finding them by their ids. If the students are not null, they are fetched from the database to ensure they exist.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      studentDTOS - The new students as a list of Student objects with at least their ids set
      Returns:
      The updated course, or null if the course doesn't exist

    • delete

      public void delete(Long id)
      Deletes a course by its id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to delete

    • removeTeacher

      public void removeTeacher(Long id)
      Removes the teacher from a course, setting it to null.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(Long id, Long studentId)
      Removes a specific student from a course.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the course to update
      studentId - The id of the student to remove
